meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Danged! I forgot my lunch again.
meanings.sent2: Oh, danged! The bus is late.
meanings.sent3: Well, danged if I didn't spill my coffee all over my shirt.
meanings.sent4: The rain came down like a danged waterfall, soaking everything in sight.
meanings.sent5: The danged alarm clock never fails to wake me up too early.

meanings.sent1: That danged cat keeps knocking over my plants.
meanings.sent2: I can't find my danged keys anywhere.
meanings.sent3: My danged phone battery died right in the middle of an important call.
meanings.sent4: The danged storm clouds loomed ominously over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The danged curse seemed to follow him wherever he went.
